item.title: How to Find The Best Sweaters on YOOX
item.description: I discovered YOOX browsing for sweaters Noel Fielding has worn on the Great British Baking Show and wow is it a lot of fun. It’s not a new site by a long shot but it’s new to me! Part of the YOOX Net-A-Porte group since their 2015 merger, YOOX is a gathering place for past season clothes and also serves as a clearance site for items that haven’t sold at retail price.
